segments.text: I notice the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and I’m terrified he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and he’s not even holding on properly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right behind the woman’s back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so calm, but inside, it’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is so focused on her task that she’s missing everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s hand is deep in the cookie jar, and I’m just waiting for the crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, but she’s part of this little scheme too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and it’s only a matter of time before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR
